title: Rust and Bone
creator_credit: Martine Cassinelli, Alix Raynaud, Pascal Caucheteux, Craig Davidson, Jacques Audiard, Thomas Bidegain, Virginie Montel, Michel Barthélémy, France Télévisions, RTBF, Canal+, Casa Kafka Pictures Movie Tax Shelter Empowered by Dexia, Département des Alpes-Maritimes, Région Provence-Alpes-Côte d'Azur, Vlaams Audiovisueel fonds, VOO, Centre du Cinéma et de l'Audiovisuel de la Fédération Wallonie-Bruxelles, Ciné+, Lunanime, Lumière, Page 114, France 2 Cinéma, Les Films du Fleuve and Why Not Productions
brief_description: Put in charge of his young son, Ali leaves Belgium for Antibes to live with his sister and her husband as a family. Ali’s bond with Stephanie, a killer whale trainer, grows deeper after Stephanie suffers a horrible accident.

constellations_other.name: Welcome to Chechnya: tales through time
constellations_other.description: Documentary Welcome to Chechnya used ground-breaking deep fake technology to hide the identities of LGBTQ+ people fleeing a government-orchestrated genocide in Chechnya.
